name: Deadlock
description: An ex-military man working at a Georgia power plant has to spring into action to prevent disaster when a group of rogue soldiers gain control of the plant and take the employees hostage.

review.author: rodneyashworth
review.heading: Don't waste your time
review.reviewBody:
Probably the worst plot and dialog I've seen in the past decade. Any episode of T. J. Hooker is far better than this tripe- and mercifully shorter.

As the algorithm requires 150 characters I will list things I would rather do than watch this movie again: 1) a root canal without anesthesia, 2) clean out porta-johns, 3) invest in a pyramid scheme, 4) soak in a tub of ice water for an hour.
